mapper.insert: insert into tj_shipping (id, user_id, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_mobile, receiver_provice, receiver_city, receiver_district, receiver_address, receiver_zip, create_time, update_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverProvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update tj_shipping set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receiver_name = #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_phone = #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_mobile = #{receiverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_provice = #{receiverProvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_city = #{receiverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_district = #{receiverDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_address = #{receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_zip = #{receiverZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tj_shipping
receiver_name = #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_phone = #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

receiver_zip = #{receiverZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = now()
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_mobile, receiver_provice, receiver_city, receiver_district, receiver_address, receiver_zip, create_time, update_time from tj_shipping where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.delete: delete from tj_shipping where id = #{shipping} and user_id = #{userId}
